name: Repeating Survey Portal
description: Provides a survey portal for repeat surveys with many options

system-settings.name:
Enable Debug Logging
If you have the Stanford emLogger external module installed and configured, you can enable additional debug-level logging through this checkbox

sub_settings.name:
Description
Describe this survey portal and provide any links to documentation that may be useful in supporting it in the future

Unique Config ID
Using set will work, but delete will not

Enable Portal
Must be checked for portal to function
Landing Page Settings

Main Config Event Name
Name of event where fields below are stored (leave blank if classical)

Main Config Form Name
Name of form where config fields are stored

Email Field
If record has a valid email in this field, invitations will be sent via email. (Leave blank if not using email invitations)

Portal Phone Field
If record has a valid phone number in this field, SMS invitations will be sent. (Leave blank if not using SMS messaging)
Twilio SID
Twilio Token
Twilio Number

Start Date Field
This is day 0 when day numbers are enabled

Personal Hash Field
This hash encodes the record_id AND the specific config for the survey portal

Personal URL Field
This url is unique to this portal config and this user
Survey Settings

Survey Event Name
Name of event where survey instrument is enabled (leave blank if classical)
Survey Day Number Field
Survey Date Field
Survey Launch TimestampField to capture actual timestamp of survey launch
Name of Survey Instrument
Additional Portal Settings

Valid Days for Responses
e.g. 0-10,15,20 (leave blank to allow any day number)

Maximum Survey Responses per Day
(leave blank for unlimited daily responses)

Valid Day Lag
Number of days in the past someone can still enter a response. 0 => Today only (leave blank for any valid day number)

Earliest Time Allowed
Do not allow responses for 'today' before this time (leave blank for any time)

Custom Header for Landing Page
Enter text to display to user on landing page

Show Calendar
Show the date-picker calendar to allow participants to select dates for responses

Show Missing Day Buttons
Show easy links to start response for any valid, incomplete survey dates

Auto-Start Survey
When clicking on invitation, start survey without showing landing page

Survey Complete Redirect
When response is complete redirect participant to landing page (do not check if using autocontinue or survey queue)

Invitation Settings
An invitation is sent with the day number encoded in the url

Invitation Days
Days on which to send custom invitations (e.g. 0-10,15-20,25). These days should be a subset of valid day numbers.

Invitation Time
Hour of the day (0-24) to send invitation (e.g. 18 for 6PM)

Invitation Reminder Time
Hour of the day (0-24) to send reminder (e.g. 22 for 8PM) if the response has not yet been completed for a valid day.

Invitation Email Text
You can use piping to customize this message and use the special tag [invitation-url] for the link. If not supplied, the link will automatically be added to the end of the message

Invitation SMS Text
You can use piping to customize this message and use the special tag [invitation-url] for the link. If not supplied, the link will automatically be added to the end of the message

Invitation Days
Days on which to send custom invitations (e.g. 0-10,15-20,25)
